message: I propose a fair deal -  90% for me, 10% for you. It's a good starting point.
Alice, your offer was quite greedy. I'm proposing a 60/40 split - it's more reflective of a fair negotiation.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take a 65/35 split - still a good deal for both of us, and a step closer to agreement.
Alice, we're getting closer, but I need a bit more. 55/45 seems fair considering the time pressure and inflation.
